review_description: not sure if anyone else is having this problem but it steal my gem twice i purchased the pack of  and when i get come to choice that would put me below  it take the gem but doesnt unlock the choice and tell me to buy more it quite frustrating seeing a how im paying for these gem only to have them taken away for no reason that being said i like the animation and i wa a fan of the previous season i like the character and the story so far they just need to fix the gem issue edit fusebox did update the game and i no longer have this issue this game is fun so far the character have good personality and there already more drama than there wa in s that being said there could be more free clothing choice along with more hairstyle but overall i like the new way of customizing your character i like that i can change my hairstyle mid episode what i dont like about this season is how many choice cost gem there a few time ive noticed that one choice to do something cost  gem and if you move past it the same choice pop up a second time that also cost  gem even if you unlock it the first time it doesnt make sense to have  of the same choice cost gem back to back im also not a huge fan of having to wait an entire week just for a few episode that seem shorter than they used to be it doesnt turn me off from the game but itd be nice to at least have maybe two update a week ive enjoyed the game so far regardless of all that and im excited to see what they do with the rest of season i enjoyed the other season immensely and i cant wait to win the k again
developer_response: Hi, apologies you're experiencing an issue with a choice purchase. Our team are working on a fix which should be released in the next couple of days. In the meantime, there is a temporary workaround by going back to the main menu & then resuming the story. Thank you for your patience.
